text: He imana vali'o! Ahisana jita ke ate dukha pahuca ke apane dana nu nasata na karo, jisa tar'ham uha bada jihara apani puji dikhave la'i kharaca karada hai ate uha alaha ate praloka de dina upara visavasa nahim rakhada. Phira usa di misala i'um hai jivem ika catana hove jisa upara kujha miti hove, phira usa ute mauhaledhara minha pave ate uha sapurana (miti nu) sapha kara deve. Ajihe lokam nu apani kama'i kujha vi hatha nahim lagegi. Alaha avagi'akari'am nu raha nahi" vikha'unda
